titles.title: Providing for the adoption of the resolution (H. Res. 895) establishing within the House of Representatives an Office of Congressional Ethics, and for other purposes.
Providing for the adoption of the resolution (H. Res. 895) establishing within the House of Representatives an Office of Congressional Ethics, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-547, by Ms. Sutton.
That H.Res. 895, amended by the amendment printed in the report of the Committee on Rules accompanying this resolution, is hereby adopted.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 195.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1031.
DEBATE - The House resumed debate on H. Res. 1031.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 207 - 206 (Roll no. 121).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 229 - 182, 4 Present (Roll no. 122).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Adopts H.Res. 895 (establishing within the House of Representatives an Office of Congressional Ethics), as amended by the amendment printed in the report of the Committee on Rules.
